00008 void tournamentSelection(GPPopulation &pop) {
00009 
00010         GPPopulation *temp = new GPPopulation(pop);
00011 
00012         int selected_index = 0;
00013         GPProgram* luckyBugger;
00014         for (int i = 0; i < temp->getSize(); i++) {
00015                 selected_index = select(pop);
00016                 luckyBugger = pop.getIndividual(selected_index);
00017                 temp->setIndividual(i, luckyBugger);
00018         }
00019 
00020         pop = *temp;
00021         delete temp;
00022 }
00023 
00024 void mutation(GPPopulation &pop) {
00025 
00026         GPPopulation *temp = new GPPopulation(pop);
00027         GPProgram *mutant;
00028 
00029         for (int i = 0; i < pop.getSize(); i++) {
00030                 if (rng.flip(mutation_prob)) {
00031                         // do a mutation, but first choose whether to do a node
00032                         // or a branch mutation
00033                         mutant = pop.getIndividual(i);
00034                         if (rng.flip(0.5)) {
00035                                 // do a node mutation
00036                                 nodeMutate(*mutant);
00037                         }
00038                         else {
00039                                 // do a branch mutation
00040                                 branchMutate(*mutant);
00041                         }
00042                         temp->setIndividual(i, mutant);
00043                 }
00044         }
00045         pop = *temp;
00046         delete temp;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void crossover(GPPopulation &pop) {
00050 
00051         GPPopulation *temp = new GPPopulation(pop);
00052         GPProgram *child;
00053         GPProgram *mom;
00054         GPProgram *dad;
00055 
00056         int popsize = pop.getSize();
00057         for (int i = 0; i < popsize; i++) {
00058             if (rng.flip(crossover_prob)) {
00059                 mom = pop.getIndividual(intRandom(0, popsize - 1));
00060                 dad = pop.getIndividual(intRandom(0, popsize - 1));
00061                 //child = new GPProgram(*(xover(mom, dad)));
00062                 child = xover(*mom, *dad);
00063                 temp->setIndividual(i, child);
00064             }
00065         }
00066         pop = *temp;
00067         delete temp;
00068 }
00069 
00070 int select(GPPopulation &pop) {
00071         int best_index = intRandom(0, pop.getSize() - 1);
00072         int competitor_index = 0;
00073 
00074         GPProgram *best = pop.getIndividual(best_index);
00075         GPProgram *competitor;
00076 
00077         double best_perf = best->getFitness();
00078         double competitor_perf = 0;
00079 
00080         for (int i = 1; i < tournamentSize; i++) {
00081 
00082             competitor_index =intRandom(0, pop.getSize() - 1);
00083             competitor = pop.getIndividual(competitor_index);
00084             competitor_perf = competitor->getFitness();
00085 
00086             if(competitor_perf < best_perf) {
00087                 best = competitor;
00088                 best_index = competitor_index;
00089             }
00090         }
00091         return best_index;
00092 }

00094 GPProgram* xover(const GPProgram &mom, const GPProgram &dad) {
00095         //GPProgram *ret = new GPProgram(*mom);
00096         GPProgram *ret = new GPProgram(mom);
00097         // quick check: mom might only have one node
00098         int momIndex = 0;
00099         int momBranchStart = 0;
00100         //if (mom->getSize() == 1) {
00101         if (mom.getSize() == 1) {
00102                 momIndex = 0;
00103         }
00104         else {
00105                 // don't do crossover at the root level
00106                 //momIndex = intRandom(0, mom->getSize() - 2);
00107                 momIndex = intRandom(0, mom.getSize() - 2);
00108         }
00109 
00110         //GPNode* momNode = mom->getNode(momIndex);
00111         GPNode* momNode = mom.getNode(momIndex);
00112         int momArity = momNode->getArity();
00113         //std::vector<int> momDepths = mom->getDepths();
00114         std::vector<int> momDepths = mom.getDepths();
00115 
00116         if (momArity == -1) {
00117                 // we have a terminal, so we just remove it
00118                 momBranchStart = momIndex;
00119                 ret->removeNode(momIndex);
00120                 ret->resetSize();
00121         }
00122         else {
00123 
00124                 // we have a subtree, so we need to prune
00125                 int momDepth = momDepths[momIndex];
00126                 if (momDepth != -1) {
00127                         //momBranchStart = findStart(momDepths, momIndex, *mom);
00128                         momBranchStart = findStart(momDepths, momIndex, mom);
00129                 }
00130                 ret->removeSubtree(momBranchStart, momIndex);
00131                 ret->resetSize();
00132         }
00133 
00134 
00135         // that's mom taken care of, now for dad..
00136         int dadIndex = 0;
00137         int dadBranchStart = 0;
00138         //if (dad->getSize() == 1) {
00139         if (dad.getSize() == 1) {
00140                 dadIndex = 0;
00141         }
00142         else {
00143                 //dadIndex = intRandom(0, dad->getSize() - 2);
00144                 dadIndex = intRandom(0, dad.getSize() - 2);
00145         }
00146         //GPNode* dadNode = dad->getNode(dadIndex);
00147         GPNode* dadNode = dad.getNode(dadIndex);
00148         int dadArity = dadNode->getArity();
00149         //std::vector<int> dadDepths = dad->getDepths();
00150         std::vector<int> dadDepths = dad.getDepths();
00151 
00152         if (dadArity == -1) {
00153                 // we've found a terminal on dad, so we simply place dadNode onto mom at momIndex
00154                 ret->insertNode(momBranchStart, dadNode);
00155                 ret->resetSize();
00156         }
00157         else {
00158                 // we have a subtree to get from dad and copy to mom..
00159                 int dadDepth = dadDepths[dadIndex];
00160                 if (dadDepth != -1) {
00161                         //dadBranchStart = findStart(dadDepths, dadIndex, *dad);
00162                         dadBranchStart = findStart(dadDepths, dadIndex, dad);
00163                 }
00164                 //std::vector<GPNode*> dadSubtree = dad->getSubtree(dadBranchStart, dadIndex);
00165                 std::vector<GPNode*> dadSubtree = dad.getSubtree(dadBranchStart, dadIndex);
00166                 ret->insertSubtree(momBranchStart, dadSubtree);
00167                 ret->resetSize();
00168         }
00169 
00170         // do a quick sanity check -- make sure that crossover hasn't exceeded the depths
00171         if (getMaxDepth(ret->getDepths()) < -MAXDEPTH) {
00172                 delete ret;
00173                 ret = new GPProgram(mom);
00174                 //return mom;
00175                 return ret;
00176         }
00177         else {
00178                 return ret;
00179         }
00180 }
00181 
00182 void branchMutate(GPProgram &indy) {
00183 
00184         GPProgram* ret = new GPProgram(indy);
00185         std::vector<int> depths = indy.getDepths();
00186         std::vector<GPNode*> subTree;
00187 
00188         // hack: never pick the first node unless there's only one
00189         int branchIndex = 0;
00190         if (indy.getSize() == 1) {
00191             branchIndex = 0;
00192         }
00193         else {
00194             // don't pick the root (end node)
00195             branchIndex = intRandom(0, indy.getSize() - 2);
00196         }
00197 
00198         GPNode *branch = indy.getNode(branchIndex);
00199         int arity = branch->getArity();
00200         int branchDepth = 0;
00201         int branchStart = 0;
00202 
00203         if (arity == -1) {
00204             // we have a terminal  
00205             branchDepth = depths[branchIndex]; 
00206 
00207             // grow a new subtree and replace this terminal with the subtree
00208             subTree = growSubtree(BRANCHSIZE, branchDepth);
00209 
00210             // now do the insert
00211             if (subTree.size() != 0) {
00212                 // remove the element at branchIndex
00213                 ret->removeNode(branchIndex);
00214                 ret->resetSize();
00215                 // insert the new subtree
00216                 ret->insertSubtree(branchIndex, subTree);
00217                 ret->resetSize();
00218             }
00219         }
00220         //else if (arity == 1) {
00221         else {
00222             // we have a function
00223             branchDepth = depths[branchIndex];
00224             // prune the subtree from this node (using find start), then grow
00225             // a new subtree in its place
00226 
00227             // if the branchDepth != -1, we have to locate the start of the
00228             // subtree and remove it
00229             //
00230             // Otherwise, we can remove from element 0
00231             if (branchDepth != -1) {
00232                 branchStart = findStart(depths, branchIndex, indy);
00233             }
00234             else {
00235                 branchStart = 0;
00236             }
00237             subTree = growSubtree(BRANCHSIZE, branchDepth);
00238             if (subTree.size() != 0) {
00239                 // prune away the old stuff
00240                 ret->removeSubtree(branchStart, branchIndex);
00241                 ret->resetSize();
00242 
00243                 // insert the new
00244                 ret->insertSubtree(branchStart, subTree);
00245                 ret->resetSize();
00246             }
00247         }
00248         indy = *ret;
00249         delete ret;
00250 }
00251 
00252 void nodeMutate(GPProgram &indy) {
00253         GPProgram *ret = new GPProgram(indy);
00254         int mutantIndex = intRandom(0, indy.getSize() - 1);
00255         //GPNode* mutant = new GPNode(*(indy.getNode(mutantIndex)));
00256         GPNode* mutant = indy.getNode(mutantIndex);
00257 
00258         int arity = mutant->getArity();
00259 
00260         if (arity == -1) {
00261                 if (rng.flip(0.5)) {
00262                         mutant = getRandomConstant();
00263                 }
00264                 else {
00265                         mutant = getRandomVariable();
00266                 }
00267         }
00268         else if (arity == 0) {
00269                 mutant = getRandomUnary();
00270         }
00271         else if (arity == 1) {
00272                 mutant = getRandomBinary();
00273         }
00274         ret->setNode(mutantIndex, mutant);
00275         indy = *ret;
00276         delete ret;
00277 }

00279 
00280 std::vector<GPNode*> growSubtree(int size, int startDepth) {
00281 
00282 
00283         std::vector<GPNode*> ret; 
00284         GPNode current;
00285         int rndnum = 0;
00286 
00287         // start with a terminal
00288         if (rng.flip(0.5)) {
00289                 rndnum = intRandom(0, t_variables.size()-1);
00290                 current = t_variables[rndnum];
00291                 //ret.push_back(new GPNode(current));
00292                 ret.push_back(&(t_variables[rndnum]));
00293         }
00294         else {
00295                 // random constant
00296                 rndnum = intRandom(0, t_constants.size()-1);
00297                 current = t_constants[rndnum];
00298                 //ret.push_back(new GPNode(current));
00299                 ret.push_back(&(t_constants[rndnum]));
00300         }
00301 
00302         int depth = -1 - startDepth;
00303         int maxdepth = -1 - startDepth;
00304         int lastValidLocation = 0;
00305         int currentArity = 0;
00306 
00307         for (int i = 1; i < size; i++) {
00308 
00309                 if (depth < -1) {
00310                         switch( rng.random(3) ) {
00311                                 case 2: 
00312                                         // random terminal
00313                                         if (rng.flip(0.5)) {
00314                                                 // random constant
00315                                                 current = t_constants[intRandom(0, t_constants.size()-1)];
00316                                                 currentArity = current.getArity();
00317                                                 //ret.push_back(new GPNode(current));
00318                                                 ret.push_back(&(t_constants[rndnum]));
00319                                         }
00320                                         else {
00321                                                 // random variable
00322                                                 current = t_variables[intRandom(0, t_variables.size()-1)];
00323                                                 currentArity = current.getArity();
00324                                                 //ret.push_back(new GPNode(current));
00325                                                 ret.push_back(&(t_variables[rndnum]));
00326                                         } 
00327                                         break;
00328                                 case 1: 
00329                                         // random unary
00330                                         current = t_unaries[intRandom(0, t_unaries.size()-1)];
00331                                         currentArity = current.getArity();
00332                                         //ret.push_back(new GPNode(current));
00333                                         ret.push_back(&(t_unaries[rndnum]));
00334                                         break;
00335                                         
00336                                 case 0: 
00337                                         // random binary
00338                                         current = t_binaries[intRandom(0, t_binaries.size()-1)];
00339                                         currentArity = current.getArity();
00340                                         //ret.push_back(new GPNode(current));
00341                                         ret.push_back(&(t_binaries[rndnum]));
00342                         }
00343                 }
00344                 else if (depth == -1) {
00345                         switch (rng.random(2)) {
00346                                 case 1:
00347                                         // random terminal 
00348                                         if (rng.flip(0.5)) {
00349                                                 current = t_constants[intRandom(0, t_constants.size()-1)];
00350                                                 currentArity = current.getArity();
00351                                                 //ret.push_back(new GPNode(current));
00352                                                 ret.push_back(&(t_constants[rndnum]));
00353                                         }
00354                                         else {
00355                                                 current = t_variables[intRandom(0, t_variables.size()-1)];
00356                                                 currentArity = current.getArity();
00357                                                 //ret.push_back(new GPNode(current));
00358                                                 ret.push_back(&(t_variables[rndnum]));
00359                                         }
00360                                         break;
00361                                 case 0: 
00362                                         // random unary
00363                                         current = t_unaries[intRandom(0, t_unaries.size()-1)];
00364                                         currentArity = current.getArity();
00365                                         //ret.push_back(new GPNode(current));
00366                                         ret.push_back(&(t_unaries[rndnum]));
00367                                         break;
00368                         }
00369                 }
00370 
00371                 depth += currentArity;
00372                 
00373                 maxdepth = min(depth, maxdepth);
00374 
00375                 if (maxdepth <= -MAXDEPTH) {
00376                         break;
00377                 }
00378 
00379                 if (depth == -1) {
00380                         lastValidLocation = i;
00381                 }
00382         }
00383 
00384         ret.resize(lastValidLocation + 1);
00385         return ret;
00386 }
00387 
00388 int findStart(std::vector<int> depths, int index, const GPProgram &gpprog) {
00389 
00390         int start = 0;
00391 
00392         if (index == 0) {
00393             return start;
00394         }
00395         else {
00396             start = index - 1;
00397         }
00398 
00399         int depth = depths[index];
00400 
00401         // make sure we find a leaf node at the start, otherwise a function could be
00402         // returned resulting in an invalid individual
00403         bool found = 0;
00404         while (!found) {
00405             if ( depth == (depths[start]) && (gpprog.getNode(start)->getArity() == -1) ) {
00406                 found = 1;
00407             }
00408             else {
00409                 start--;
00410             }
00411         }
00412         return start;
00413 
00414 }

00416 
00417 int getMaxDepth(std::vector<int> depths) {
00418         int max = 1000; // FIXME might want to make this bigger
00419         int val = 0;
00420         for (unsigned i = 0; i < depths.size(); i++) {
00421                 val = depths[i];
00422                 if (val <= max) {
00423                         max = val;
00424                 }
00425         }
00426         return max;
00427 }
